acquisition package#

Submodules#

acquisition.error module#

Error Module: Manage issue

acquisition.error.error_message(tag, exception)#

Send custom error message tag + detail

Args:

tag (str): exception tag custom by situration exception (str): exception detail

acquisition.get_data module#

Data Module Acquisiton

acquisition.get_data.convert_dataset(dataset)#

converting python list into csv text

Args:

dataset (list): data signal list

Returns:

str: csv content

acquisition.get_data.get_a_full_dataset()#

setting up dataset from arduino data

Returns:

list: list of data tuple

acquisition.get_data.read_data()#

Getting arduino data from port

Returns:

str: data signal

acquisition.get_data.save_data_csv(name)#

save data in csv file

Args:

name (str): csv filename

acquisition.ihm module#

IHM Module: Prompt interface for acqauisition data

Note

This module is for development part it wonâ€™t be used for the future of the application

Warning

Do not set on this part on production deployment

acquisition.ihm.acquisition_start()#

Start function IHM for acquisition purpose

acquisition.ihm.confirm(msg)#

Confirmation message with keypressing wait for next step

Args:

msg (str): message printed before keypress

acquisition.ihm.main()#

main function of the ihm

acquisition.ihm.plotter()#

plotter function show one data

acquisition.ihm.selecting()#

Asking id solution

Returns:

str: user input

acquisition.ihm.selecting_cmd()#

Asking id solution

Returns:

str: user input

acquisition.ihm.start_acquisition(solution)#

Start Acquisition process, control and give protocol

Args:

solution (str): id_solution numero

acquisition.langue module#

Langue Module for future multilanguage integration

acquisition.plotter module#

Plotter Module : visualize signal data

acquisition.plotter.get_csv(full_path)#

read csv file

Args:

full_path (str): full path csv filename

Returns:

content: list of csv lines

acquisition.plotter.plot_data(full_path)#

Show data graph

acquisition.plotter.serialiser(full_path)#

Convert csv line into python list

Returns:

list, list: Tuple of x and y list

acquisition.process module#

Process Module : Do multiple acquisition for creating dataset

acquisition.process.acquisition(solution_id) → None#

Multiple singla data acquistion for one id situation

Args:

solution_id (str): id situation

acquisition.process.csv_path(acq_path, solution_id, i) → str#

Create dataset_path

Args:

acq_path (str): Acquisition path solution_id (str): solution number i (i): current step

Returns:

str: complete path for csv file

acquisition.process.get_last_id(acq_path, solution_id) → int#

Getting last csv number

Args:

acq_path (str): csv path solution_id (str): solution id

Returns:

int: last id csv

acquisition.process.step_message(step, acq_lenght, path) → None#

Print every message before each step

Args:

step (str): step number acq_lenght (str): number of steps path (str): path where data will be saved

acquisition.setup module#

Setup Module: Contain configuration for the project and arduino information

acquisition.setup.arduino_setup()#

Connecting to the arduino COM port

Returns:

serial.Serial: serial object to interact with the arduino
